name: Efreeti Noble
description: The Efreeti Noble is a powerful Large elemental with a strong presence, characterized by its fiery attributes and notable strength.
memorable: It can summon a wall of magical flame and has powerful fire-based spells.
goals: Often seeks to dominate and manipulate the battlefield through fire and spells.
relations: Related to other fire elementals, potentially commanding lesser efreet.
environment: Typically found in the Elemental Plane of Fire or areas associated with fire.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage and powerful innate spellcasting.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to non-fire damage types, lacks defensive immunities.
attacks: Can deliver lethal brass sword slashes and devastating fire attacks from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: Creates a Fiery Wall that inflicts fire damage and obstructs movement.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and has a passive perception of 17.
skills: Excels in athletics, intimidation, and perception.
additional_information: Can alter its size and form at will.
Can summon a fire elemental with conjure elemental.
Capable of plane shifting to the Elemental Plane of Fire.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting based on Charisma, allowing it to cast spells without material components.
test_queries: large elemental creature casting fire spells
powerful fire elemental with wall of flames
efreeti with immunity to fire damage
fiery creature that can alter its form
